description: Terayama Reiko is the daughter of Terayama Daitaku, one of the richest men in Tokyo. At home and in public, she is the epitome of cultivated sophistication. However, when she gets on to her motorbike, her Bimo-chan, she becomes a crazy biker, intent on beating every man on the road. She prefers her Bimo-chan over all men, and will only sleep with a man if he can beat her and Bimo-chan over the mountain passes. There is no such man ... or is there?
name: Terayama Reiko
